entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
